content: AUGUSTA  Georgia Tiger Woods  set to attract huge crowds on his much hyped return to the Masters  has been grouped with fellow American Jimmy Walker and Welshman Jamie Donaldson for Thursday's first round at Augusta National.
name: Donaldson Company Inc
title: Woods grouped with Walker and Donaldson for first round
